content.rendered:
Yes! It’s free to create an account Roomi for personal and business use. 

If you’re looking to rent out your room: you can have up to two active listings at a time and connect with up to 5 people per day for free.


If you’re looking for a roommate or a place to move, you can message up to 5 people per day for free.

If you want to get verified (ID verification and background check), create more listings, or message more people, you’ll need to upgrade your account to a Roomi Gold, Solo Agent or Unlimited.

Learn more about subscriptions


Using Roomi for Business? Click here

jetpack-related-posts.title: How can I trust that listings are real?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi

jetpack-related-posts.title: Can I list multiple rooms?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Roomi only allows multiple rooms if they are at the same address.
